mandate_id.description: The ID of the mandate that triggered this gate.

required_approvers.description: List of DIDs or roles required to approve the gate.

approvals.description: List of DIDs that have approved the gate.

rejections.description: List of DIDs that have rejected the gate.

expires_at.description: Optional timestamp for automatic gate expiration.

payload.description: Relevant data from the mandate for human review.
